metadata.notes: Community-based recommendations - actual requirements vary based on troop bonuses, captain gear, and tech

citadels.name: Elven Citadel

recommended_troops.notes: Archers and flying units deal damage safely from behind siege

strategy_tips: Use ranged/flying troops - they hit from behind your siege output
Avoid melee troops at this level if possible
Elven citadels have heavy walls and ranged/heavy units

citadels.name: Elven Citadel

recommended_troops.notes: Riders/horse units perform better at this tier

strategy_tips: Mounted troops are fast with balanced offense and health
Better synergy with siege bursts at this level
Citadel defenses hit harder - mounted troops handle this well

citadels.name: Elven Citadel
strategy_tips: Melee troops absorb more hits and synergize with wall-breaking
Bring Griffins or flyers for extra damage and survivability

citadels.name: Elven Citadel

recommended_troops.notes: Requires large army and strong siege support

strategy_tips: Melee troops synergize with wall-breaking after catapults break through
Bring Griffins or flyers for extra damage and survivability
This level requires massive siege and army investment

catapult_importance: Citadels have very high wall health - catapults are ESSENTIAL to break the wall
Without enough siege, your troops hit the wall repeatedly and lose massively before damaging interior units
Stack catapults first before worrying about troop composition
As citadel level increases, wall HP rises sharply requiring exponentially more catapults
troop_tips: Don't mix too many troop types - focus on one type effective for that tier
Check your captain's bonuses - monster/citadel bonuses help a ton
Sometimes more lower-tier catapults are better than fewer higher-tier ones if march capacity is limited
attack_preparation: Bring enough catapults FIRST - if you can't break the wall quickly, your army dies
Use matching troops for the recommended type at each level
Higher tier catapults vs quantity: balance based on your march capacity

level_summary.25: Catapults Tier V + Melee + large army
